import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../style/index.css' const Header = () => { const [styleState, setStyleState] = useState({ style: { display: 'none', height: '80px', flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'strech', justifyContent: 'space-evenly', paddingTop: '15px', paddingBottom: '10px', paddingLeft: '40px', backgroundColor: 'rgba(192, 182, 182, 0.479)', boxShadow: '0.5px 1px 10px 2px grey', }, searchButtonStyle: { alignSelf: 'flex-start', justifySelf: 'flex-start', marginRigth: '20px', background: 'black', color: 'white', borderRadius: '25px 25px 25px 25px', height: '45px', width: '90px', border: 'none', outline: 'none', fontFamily: 'Roboto', fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center', boxShadow: '3px 5px 20px 3px grey', }, searchBoxStyle: { marginRight: '30px', borderRadius: '20px 20px 20px 20px', border: '1px solid', height: '40px', boxShadow: '1px 3px 10px 1px grey', fontFamily: 'Roboto', outline: 'none', paddingLeft: '10px', }, iconStyle: { justifySelf: 'flex-end', alignSelf: 'flex-end', cursor: 'pointer', paddingTop: '5px', }, }) const searchBarCloseHandler = () => { setStyleState({ style: { display: 'none', }, }) } const [headerState, setHeaderState] = useState({ navHeader: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', padding: '1rem', }, navToggle: { fontSize: '1.5rem', color: 'hsl(205, 78%, 60%)', backgroundColor: 'transparent', borderColor: 'transparent', outline: 'none', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.3s linear', }, listStyle: { listStyleType: 'none', height: 'auto', display: 'flex', }, ulStyle: { listStyleType: 'none', }, navLinks: { fontSize: '1rem', textTransform: 'capitalize', letterSpacing: '0.1rem', display: 'block', padding: '0.5rem 1rem', transition: 'all 0.3s linear', textDecoration: 'none', }, }) const MEbarsHandler = () => { setHeaderState({ navHeader: { ...headerState.navHeader }, navToggle: { ...headerState.navToggle, transform: 'rotate(90deg)' }, navLinks: { ...headerState.navLinks }, }) } const MLbarsHandler = () => { setHeaderState({ navHeader: { ...headerState.navHeader }, navToggle: { ...headerState.navToggle, transform: 'rotate(0deg)' }, navLinks: { ...headerState.navLinks }, }) } const showListHandler = () => { setHeaderState({ navHeader: { ...headerState.navHeader }, navToggle: { ...headerState.navToggle }, navLinks: { ...headerState.navLinks }, }) } return (

) } export default Header
